text: Here I thought cursive was dead!

Maybe it’s just me but I find it’s sometimes hard to find the api’s like search in the docs,  I get that they are organized separate from HubL docs and whatnot, but it’d be nice if there were big clear buttons to go from APIs to HubL and whatnot.

Unrelated to my previous message, it’d be nice if the cog menu/whatever it’s called showed “Open Design Manager” in the dropdown nav when “edit template” isn’t available.

<https://spin.d.pr/S6lCNT+>
This was actually a 404 error page, would be cool if it could do “edit template” but if it’s too hard simply opening the design manager is better than nothing.

Also “Website Pages” would be another good link
